Uses of Class
controller.Conference

  • Packages that use Conference 
    Package Description
    controller  

    • Uses of Conference in controller

      Methods in controller that return Conference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Conference Review.getConference() 
      Conference Controller.getCurrentConference()
      Returns the conference that is being looked at by the user.
      Conference[] Controller.getMyConferences(java.lang.String the_username)
      Returns an array of Conference objects that the user that is passed in belongs to.
      Conference[] Controller.getUpcommingConferences(java.lang.String the_username)
      Gets all conferences that are upcoming but not in myConferences.
      Methods in controller with parameters of type Conference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Controller.addPaperRecommendation(java.lang.String the_sub_pc_username, Conference current_conf, java.lang.String current_paper_being_recommended, java.lang.String the_paper_author, int the_numerical_value, java.lang.String the_rational_for_recommendation)
      Adds a recommendation of the SubProgramChair to the database with their grade and rationale of the paper passed in.
      void Controller.addReviewers(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_paper, java.lang.String[] the_reviewers)
      Adds the reviewers to the passed in paper.
      void Controller.addSubPC(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_paper, java.lang.String the_sub_pc)
      Adds a user as a SubPC to a given conference and paper.
      boolean Controller.canAddReview(Conference the_conf, java.lang.String the_paper, java.lang.String the_username)
      A method that is called to see if the number of reviews on a paper is less than MAX_NUMBER_OF_REVIEWS and that the current user hasn't already submitted a review for the passed in paper.
      void Controller.createNewConference(Conference the_conference)
      Creates a new conference.
      void Controller.createNewPaper(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_username, java.lang.String the_paper_title, java.lang.String the_file_submitted, GUIEnum.paperStatusAuthorViewable the_user_viewable_status, GUIEnum.paperStatusAdminViewable the_admin_viewable_status)
      This method adds a new paper to database as long as MAX_NUMBER_USER_SUBMITTED_PAPERS hasn't been reached.
      void Controller.createNewReview(java.lang.String the_reviewer_username, Conference the_conf, java.lang.String the_paper, java.lang.String the_paper_author, java.lang.String the_comments_to_subpc, int[] the_answersRadioBtn, java.lang.String the_summary_comments)
      Creates a new review in the database.
      void Controller.deletePaper(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_username, java.lang.String the_paper_title)
      Deletes the paper from the table.
      GUIEnum.paperStatusAdminViewable Controller.getAdminPaperStatus(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_paper_title)
      Gets the admin status of a paper in a given conference.
      java.lang.String[] Controller.getAvailableForSubPC(Conference current_conf, int current_paper, java.lang.String the_pc)
      A method that populates a string array of all users that are capable of being a subprogram chair.
      java.lang.String[] Controller.getAvailableReviewers(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_paper, java.lang.String the_person_assigning)
      Method that returns all of the available reviewers for a given paper.
      Paper[] Controller.getMyPapers(Conference the_conf, java.lang.String the_username)
      Returns an array of Papers that are in the conference passed in and are associated with the user.
      java.lang.String Controller.getPaperAuthor(Conference the_conf, java.lang.String the_paper)
      Used by an administrative user to see the author of the paper that they are examining.
      java.lang.String Controller.getPaperFilePath(Conference the_conf, java.lang.String the_paper_title)
      Returns the text of the paper that is passed in.
      int Controller.getPaperRecommendationNumericalValuefinal(Conference the_conf, java.lang.String the_paper)
      Retrieves the numerical grade given to the_paper passed by the subprogramchair of that paper relating to the_conf passed in.
      java.lang.String Controller.getPaperRecommendationRationale(Conference the_conf, java.lang.String the_paper)
      Retrieves the SubPC's recommendation for a paper from the database given a conference and a paper within that conference.
      java.lang.String Controller.getPaperRecommendationSubPCName(Conference the_conf, java.lang.String the_paper)
      Retrieves the SubProgramChair's username from the recommendation of the paper passed in from the conference passed in.
      GUIEnum.paperRelation Controller.getRelationToPaper(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_paper_title, java.lang.String the_username)
      Returns the relation of the person passed in with the paper passed in.
      Review[] Controller.getReviews(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_paper)
      Returns an array of Review Objects of the given paper in the given conference.
      GUIEnum.paperStatusAuthorViewable Controller.getStatusAuthorView(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_paper_title)
      Gets the author status of a paper in a given conference.
      java.lang.String Controller.getUserAssignedAsPC(Conference the_conference)
      Method that returns the PC for a given conference.
      java.lang.String Controller.getUserAssignedAsSubPC(Conference the_conference, int current_paper)
      Retrieves the username of the subprogram chair given a passed in Conference and paper.
      java.lang.String[] Controller.getUsersAssignedAsReviewers(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String current_paper)
      This method returns all of the userNames of the reviewers that are assigned to a particular paper.
      void Controller.setCurrentConference(Conference the_conference_name)
      Sets the current conference to the conference of the person currently being looked at by the user.
      void Controller.setPaperStatus(Conference the_conference, java.lang.String the_paper_title, GUIEnum.paperStatusAuthorViewable the_author_viewable_status, GUIEnum.paperStatusAdminViewable the_admin_viewable_status)
      Sets the author and admin status of a paper.
